comment.author: 74201745@N00
comment._content: Wow. A widow at 32, a mother and she's the only woman welder at Heil.

comment.author: 15965815@N00
comment._content: According to Wikipedia there was a "Wendy the Welder" descriptor/archetype, but like Wikipedia tends to do, there's no supporting information.

comment.author: 29296778@N06
comment._content:
I met Wendy when she was volunteering on board the SS Jeremiah O'Brien back in the 80s she signed a postcard version of he poster for my niece.

There were more welders than riveters in WWII.
